text:
What is the distance formula and how do you derive it

\begin{array}{c}\n\frac{1}{5} \cdot \frac{1}{5}(5,3) \\\n\frac{8}{5} \\\n\frac{1}{5} \\\n\frac{1}{5}\n\end{array}[imath]\frac{1}{5} \cdot \frac{1}{5}(5,3) [/imath] [imath]\frac{8}{5} [/imath] [imath]\frac{1}{5} [/imath] [imath]\frac{1}{5}[/imath]
